long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wipe Track - Keep Your Browsing Private and Secure

Wipe Track is your go-to solution for maintaining online privacy with ease. This powerful browser extension wipes out browsing data, cookies, and cached files to ensure your digital footprint is erased and your browsing experience stays fast and secure.

Key Features:
- Full History Erase: Clear your entire browsing history or select specific time periods to protect your privacy effortlessly.
- Cookie Remover: Automatically delete tracking cookies that compromise your privacy and slow down your browsing speed.
- Cache Purge: Eliminate cached files to improve browser performance and free up space for faster page loading.
- Automatic Cleanups: Set Wipe Track to clean your browser data at regular intervals, so you never have to worry about manual maintenance.
- Quick Session Cleaner: End your browsing session with one click to instantly remove history, cookies, and other dataâ€”ideal for shared or public computers.
- Flexible Data Management: Choose which data to wipe, including saved form information, browsing history, and download records, giving you total control over your privacy.
- Universal Browser Support: Works flawlessly with all major browsers, ensuring protection across any platform.
- Lightweight and Unobtrusive: Wipe Track runs efficiently in the background, keeping your browser running smoothly without slowing you down.
- Simple and Intuitive UI: With a clean, easy-to-navigate interface, even non-technical users can clean their browser in seconds.

Wipe Track makes it easy to keep your browsing data private, secure, and under your control. Download today and start wiping your tracks with confidence!
